tool_description: US and state flag half-staff events in JSON format.
title: Flag Status

api_list.name: Get half-staff events for given flag
api_list.description: Get all half-staff events for the provided flag
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flag-status.p.rapidapi.com/events/{code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flag-status.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

Are there any half-staff events for the Ohio state flag?
Check the half-staff events for the Georgia flag.

api_list.name: Get current status for given flag
api_list.description: Get the current status for the provided flag
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flag-status.p.rapidapi.com/status/{code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flag-status.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all half-staff events for every flag
api_list.description: Get every half-staff event for the last 365 days
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flag-status.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flag-status.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Show me all the US and state flag half-staff events from the past year.
Get every half-staff event for US and state flags in the last 365 days.

Provide a record of all half-staff flag events for the last 365 days.
Retrieve all US and state flag half-staff events from the previous year.
Give me a summary of all half-staff events for flags in the US and states over the past 365 days.
Fetch all half-staff flag events for the last year for both US and state flags.
Show all half-staff events for US and state flags that happened in the past 365 days.
Get a list of every half-staff event for US and state flags during the last year.
Provide all half-staff flag events for the US and states from the last 365 days.
